reviewText: Richard Harding Davis's great short story about a wonderful boy reporter in Philadelphia at the turn of the century, is brought to life -- and what  life. Gallegher, and his dog Watson, run down a ...Oh, no. It is not about plot but period charm. The Ace Reporter is played by a guy named Harrison Ford. Not that one but the silent film actor and he is just fine. The film appears to have been remastered. A treat. Highly Recommended.
